verbs.description: RALEIGH , N.C. ( AP ) - [ARG0: Three - term incumbent Rep. Robert Pittenger of North Carolina] [ARGM-MNR: narrowly] [V: lost] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG2: to a Southern Baptist pastor] [ARGM-LOC: in a GOP primary rematch focused on their evangelical Christian credentials and loyalty to President Donald Trump] .

RALEIGH , N.C. ( AP ) - Three - term incumbent Rep. Robert Pittenger of North Carolina narrowly lost Tuesday to a Southern Baptist pastor in [ARG0: a GOP primary rematch] [V: focused] [ARG2: on their evangelical Christian credentials and loyalty to President Donald Trump] .
